name: Brake yourself
description:
Submittion for GMTK GameJam2018.

Racing Game but you cannot break.

Can you complete the fastest lap using as few cars as possible?

Controls

A + D or arrow keys to Turn

Space to self destruct

Music: www.bensound.com
Unity Assets

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/2d-flat-explosion-66...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/f1-speed-car-pack-56...
